## Example for Retrieving and Filtering Variables
```{r}
source("GET_VARS.R")
files <- dir( "./ballet_990_released_20230208",
              full.names = TRUE)
data_test <- map_df(files, ~
                    get_df(variables =  "//Return//ReturnHeader//ReturnTypeCd",
                           filename = .x,
                           names = c())) 

data <- filter_ein(data_test)
```
